bool Step::SPFHeader::parse ( std::ifstream &  ifs,
unsigned int &  counter 
)

Parse an input stream to extract the header.

Parameters:
ifs the input stream. Its position will be set at the end of the header section
counter an integer for line counting. This method updates the counter
Returns:
true if the header has no syntax error.
